location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babingten [Babington], Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting the copy of a dispatch sent from G Strackey, Chief Secretary to the Government at Fort S George, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, on 25 January 1814, requesting assistance and attention on behalf of Azemood Dowlah Bahadoor [Azim-Ud-Daula], Nawob of the Carnatic, to his aunt, Sultan[a] Oom Nisser Begum, during her pilgrimage to Mecca.The letter encloses copies of letters translated from Persian, received by the Nawob of the Carnatic from Sultan[a] Oom Nisser Begum and from Fatima Beegum, giving details and requirements on their forthcoming pilgrimage.
